description.value: You have learned to remain hidden by using larger folk as a distraction to avoid drawing attention to yourself. You can use creatures that are at least one size larger than you (usually Medium or larger) as cover for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak] actions, though you still can't use such creatures as cover for other uses, such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Take Cover] action.
